Text: @rgmontejo: No, it is not HD, else I would have put it in that section. It is, however, the highest res I could find of this.
why can't apple itunes use a torrent client for all the downloads?
@syriaccjoseph: because "torrents = piracy", which is wrong. Don't ever expect a large company to use this nice open method of content distribution, due to their incorrect ideas on torrents. :(
